screenshots.label: Shows the "Edit vimrc" dialog open. Commands are the same as shown in the readme: unmap <C-c>, unmap <C-v> to allow copy/paste with ctrl+c, imap jk <Esc> to make Escape exit insert mode
Screenshot: Joplin's go-to-anything dialog box displays a search query of :vimrc with one command result, Edit .vimrc.
